item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. From Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of commercial spyware on iOS [video] (243 points | 74 comments)
2. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (50 points | 11 comments)
3. Curl-Impersonate (40 points | discuss)
4. Limits to Growth (1972) (11 points | 1 comment)
5. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (283 points | 43 comments)
6. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (121 points | 29 comments)
7. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
8. VW Group Collects Vehicle Movement Data (106 points | 55 comments)
9. The Cody Computer (167 points | 20 comments)
10. Nikon reveals a lens that captures wide and telephoto images simultaneously (82 points | 41 comments)
11. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (26 points | 10 comments)
12. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (83 points | 15 comments)
13. Meta wants more access to your iPhone (24 points | 13 comments)
14. Overloading the lambda abstraction in Haskell (2022) (40 points | 2 comments)
15. The Zombocom Problem (186 points | 52 comments)
16. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (11 points | 6 comments)
17. Wi-Fi and the Problem with Radar (DFS) (4 points | discuss)
18. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (216 points | 24 comments)
19. Against the Hydraulic Analogy (19 points | 9 comments)
20. Archibald Low's ‘ruthlessly imaginative’ 1925 predictions come true, mostly (45 points | 17 comments)
21. Issues with object-oriented programming in Guile (28 points | 3 comments)
22. The last Inca bridge master (117 points | 26 comments)
23. Rod Serling on Doomsday (48 points | 8 comments)
24. Curl with Partial Files (10 points | discuss)
25. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (221 points | 358 comments)
26. Show HN: Chorus, a Mac app that lets you chat with a bunch of AIs at once (98 points | 41 comments)
27. WebGL Fluid Simulation (423 points | 55 comments)
28. Neuters: Lightweight front end to Reuters News (65 points | 42 comments)
29. Reverse Video Search (9 points | 4 comments)
30. Is Iceland getting ready to join the EU? (263 points | 514 comments)
